intervention_catalogue.name: Living as New Me
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Living as New Me (LNM) is a booster or maintenance programme for men who have completed New Me Strengths or Becoming New Me Plus and may need extra support. In a custody setting, it is for men convicted of any offence. In the community, it is for sexual offences only.
intervention_catalogue.long_description: Living as New Me (LNM) is a booster or maintenance programme for men who have completed New Me Strengths or Becoming New Me Plus and may need extra support. In a custody setting, it is for men convicted of any offence. In the community, it is for sexual offences only.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail: Minimum of 5 x group sessions (depends on group size and the needs of each individual)

enabling_intervention_detail:
Becoming New Me Plus (BNM+) or 
New Me Strengths (NMS)
possible_outcomes: assist participant to desist from crime
